fields.description:
We have a Node.ACS App deployed. The App works fine, however every once in a while the App simply stops for no apparent reason.

I wish I had more information to disclose, but the how & why the Node.ACS stops is not clear.

Workaround:
Re-deploy Node.ACS app
fields.summary: Node.ACS sometimes Stops for no apparent reason

comments.body: Sorry, can't reproduce the problem. Hopefully you can get more info about this problem.
It seems that if within 4 - 5 days the Node.ACS does not get any calls, it goes to sleep. Found a workaround.
